Concrete Slab Volume Calculator

Calculate the concrete volume needed for a rectangular slab based on length, width, and thickness.

Concrete Volume: — cubic feet Total volume of concrete required for the slab in cubic feet.
Concrete Volume: — cubic yards Total volume of concrete required for the slab in cubic yards.

How this calculator works

This calculator multiplies the slab length, width, and thickness to determine the total concrete volume required.

When to use this calculator

Use this calculator when planning concrete slabs for patios, driveways, floors, or similar flat surfaces.
